title: Esperanto Analyzer
description:
Esperanto stemmer and analyzer from Brion Vibber:
  http://cvs.sourceforge.net/viewcvs.py/wikipedia/lucene-search/org/wikimedia/lsearch/

I asked Brion to follow up to this issue and attach his code with ASL 2.0.

comments.content:
I'm resolving this issue because no code is attached and the
provided link doesn't work for me. Also, nobody commented
on this issue for more than a year.

comments.content:
FWIW: the source repository moved, but was pretty easy to find...

http://svn.wikimedia.org/viewvc/mediawiki/trunk/lucene-search/org/wikimedia/lsearch/EsperantoAnalyzer.java?view=log
http://svn.wikimedia.org/viewvc/mediawiki/trunk/lucene-search/org/wikimedia/lsearch/EsperantoStemFilter.java?view=log

...so people interested in this issue should look there.

but that doesn't change the fact that without code being attached with "Grant license to ASF for inclusion in ASF works" this issue should remain "Incomplete"
